name: B. Pairs
statement:
Toad Ivan has m pairs of integers, each integer is between 1 and n,
inclusive. The pairs are (a_1, b_1), (a_2, b_2),
ldots, (a_m, b_m). He asks you to check if there exist two integers x
and y (1
leq x < y
leq n) such that in each given pair at least one integer is equal to x
or y.
